text: some of my closest and dearest friends
are hbs classmates
a few of them i went to college with as
well so that's that's kind of an extra
i'm not sure where to count those but
over time as i've bumped into more
classmates in different parts of my life
and become close to them
i just think i went to school with some
of the most amazing people
they've been tremendous guides to me
over time you can pick up the phone and
really call anybody in your class and
say hey i need your advice about
something or your counsel or a
connection and they're really there for
you
and i just find that when i come back to
reunions i think gosh why didn't i spend
more time with this person when i was
here and a little bit less time studying
so that would be i think the one thing
that i really wished i'd done more of
here is just spend time with the amazing
people i went to school with and i mean
that from the bottom of my heart they're
just amazing i feel like we had a great
section and a great class
